user.description: Čítali ste readme? Čítali ste licenciu? Si naozaj istý?

choice_restart.description:
Aby Spook dokončil nastavenie, musí sa reštartovať Home Assistant.

Chcete teraz reštartovať Home Assistant?

automation_unknown_area_references.description:
Spook našiel ducha vo vašich automatizáciách 👻

Zatiaľ čo plával okolo, Spook prekročil cestu s nasledujúcou automatizáciou:

[{automation}]({edit}) (ententity_id}`)

Táto automatizácia odkazuje na nasledujúce oblasti, ktoré nie sú známe Home Assistant:

{areas}



Ak chcete opraviť túto chybu, [edit automatizáciu]({edit}) a odstrániť používanie týchto neexistujúcich oblastí.

Spook 👻 Tvoj homie.
automation_unknown_area_references.title: Neznáme oblasti používané v: {automation}

automation_unknown_device_references.description:
Spook has found a ghost in your automations 👻

While floating around, Spook crossed path with the following automation:

[{automation}]({edit}) (`{entity_id}`)

This automation references the following devices, which are unknown to Home Assistant:

{devices}



To fix this error, [edit the automation]({edit}) and remove the use of these non-existing devices.

Spook 👻 Your homie.
automation_unknown_device_references.title: Neznáme zariadenia používané v: {automation}

automation_unknown_entity_references.description:
Spook has found a ghost in your automations 👻

While floating around, Spook crossed path with the following automation:

This automation references the following entities, which are unknown to Home Assistant:

{entities}



To fix this error, [edit the automation]({edit}) and remove the use of these non-existing entities.

Spook 👻 Your homie.
automation_unknown_entity_references.title: Neznáme entity používané v: {automation}

automation_unknown_service_references.title: Neznáme akcie používané v: {automation}

group_unknown_members.description:
Spook has found a ghost in your groups 👻

While floating around, Spook crossed path with the following group:

{group} (`{entity_id}`)

This group has members, which are unknown to Home Assistant:

{entities}



To fix this error, edit the group, remove the use of these non-existing entities and restart Home Assistant.

Spook 👻 Your homie.
group_unknown_members.title: Neznámi členovia skupiny v: {group}

integration_unknown_source.description:
Spook has found a ghost in your Riemann sum integral helpers 👻

While floating around, Spook crossed path with the following helper:

{helper} (`{entity_id}`)

This helper has a source entity unknown to Home Assistant:

`{source}`



To fix this error, edit the helper and adjust the source entity (or remove the helper) and restart Home Assistant.

Spook 👻 Your homie.
integration_unknown_source.title: Neznámy zdroj: {helper}

lovelace_unknown_entity_references.description:
Spook has found a ghost in your dashboards 👻

While floating around, Spook crossed path with the following dashboard:

[{dashboard}]({edit})

This dashboard references the following entities, which are unknown to Home Assistant:

{entities}



To fix this error, [edit the dashboard]({edit}) and remove the use of these non-existing entities.

Spook 👻 Your homie.
lovelace_unknown_entity_references.title: Neznáme entity používané v: {dashboard}

proximity_unknown_ignored_zones.description:
Spook has found a ghost in your proximity configuration 👻

While floating around, Spook crossed path with the following proximity configuration:

{name}

This configuration is ignoring zones that are unknown to Home Assistant:

{zones}



To fix this error, edit the configuration and remove this/these zones.

Spook 👻 Your homie.
proximity_unknown_ignored_zones.title: Neznáme ignorované zóny: {name}

proximity_unknown_tracked_entities.description:
Spook has found a ghost in your proximity configuration 👻

While floating around, Spook crossed path with the following proximity configuration:

{name}

This configuration is tracking persons or devices trackers that are unknown to Home Assistant:

{entities}



To fix this error, edit the configuration and remove this/these entities.

Spook 👻 Your homie.
proximity_unknown_tracked_entities.title: Neznáme sledované entity: {name}

proximity_unknown_zone.description:
Spook has found a ghost in your proximity configuration 👻

While floating around, Spook crossed path with the following proximity configuration:

{name}

This configuration is based on a zone that is unknown to Home Assistant:

`{zone}`



To fix this error, as you can't change the zone of a proximity configuration, the only option is to remove this specific proximity integration instance.

Spook 👻 Your homie.
proximity_unknown_zone.title: Neznáma zóna: {zone}

switch_as_x_unknown_source.description:
Spook has found a ghost in your Switch as X helpers 👻

While floating around, Spook crossed path with the following helper:

{helper} (`{entity_id}`)

This helper has a source switch entity unknown to Home Assistant:

`{source}`



To fix this error, edit the helper and adjust the source entity (or remove the helper) and restart Home Assistant.

Spook 👻 Your homie.

confirm_restart.title: Reštart požadovaný
confirm_restart.description:
In order for Spook 👻 to finish setting up, Home Assistant needs to be restarted.

Select submit to restart Home Assistant now.
